item.description: Our lovely Christina is opening her doors for a Christmas party at her home in Amherst. It will provide many of us the opportunity to get to know eachother on a more personal level. Everyone is asked to bring a pot luck dish and a unisex gift not more than ten dollars for a Yankee Swap. Alcohol is optional. I will definitely bring some wine and holiday cheer...
item.name: XMAS Party
